description: This file contains utility functions and helpers for managing authentication flows, session management, OAuth URL construction, token exchange, user info retrieval, and API token validation in a backend service related to Atlassian products (Jira and Confluence).

methods.name: str generate_session_id()
methods.description: Generates a unique UUID4 string for session identification.

methods.name: str generate_oauth_state()
methods.description: Creates a secure OAuth state parameter for CSRF protection.

methods.name: None store_oauth_state(state: str, provider: str, redirect_uri: str)
methods.description: Stores the OAuth state along with provider and redirect URI for later validation.

methods.name: bool validate_oauth_state(state: str, provider: str)
methods.description: Checks if the OAuth state is valid and matches the stored provider, then cleans up.

methods.name: None store_session(session_id: str, token_info: TokenInfo)
methods.description: Stores session token information in in-memory storage.

methods.name: Optional[TokenInfo] get_session(session_id: str)
methods.description: Retrieves session token information from storage by session ID.

methods.name: str build_oauth_url(provider: str, redirect_uri: str, state: str)
methods.description: Constructs an OAuth authorization URL with appropriate parameters based on provider.

methods.name: Optional[Dict] exchange_code_for_token(code: str, redirect_uri: str)
methods.description: Asynchronously exchanges an OAuth authorization code for an access token.

methods.name: Optional[Dict] get_user_info(access_token: str)
methods.description: Fetches user profile info from Atlassian API using an access token.

methods.name: Optional[Dict] validate_api_token(domain: str, email: str, api_token: str, provider: str)
methods.description: Validates the API token against Jira or Confluence endpoints to verify credentials.

ctags.name: build_oauth_url
ctags.pattern: /^def build_oauth_url(provider: str, redirect_uri: str, state: str) -> str:$/

ctags.name: exchange_code_for_token
ctags.pattern: /^async def exchange_code_for_token(code: str, redirect_uri: str) -> Optional[Dict]:$/

ctags.name: store_oauth_state
ctags.pattern: /^def store_oauth_state(state: str, provider: str, redirect_uri: str) -> None:$/

ctags.name: validate_api_token
ctags.pattern: /^async def validate_api_token(domain: str, email: str, api_token: str, provider: str) -> Optional/
ctags.signature: (domain: str, email: str, api_token: str, provider: str)
